text.body:
śrīādināthāya namo 'stu tasmai yenopadiṣṭā haṭhayogavidyā/
virājate pronnatarājasaudham āroḍhum icchor arirohaṇīva//
praṇamya śrī guruṃ nāthaṃ svātmārāmeṇa dhīmatā/
kevalaṃ rājayogāya haṭhayogopadiśyate//
bhrāntvā bahumatadhvānte rājayogam ajānataḥ/
haṭhapradīpikāṃ dhatte svātmārāmaḥ kṛpāparaḥ//
haṭhavidyāṃ hi matsyendragorakṣādyā vijānate/
ātmārāmo 'thavā yogī jānīte tatprasādataḥ//
śrīādināthamatsyendraśāradānandabhairavāḥ/
cauraṅgīmīnagorakṣavirūpākṣabileśayāḥ// *
manthānabhairavo yogī siddhabuddhaś ca kanthariḥ/
{}{}{}{}{} {}// *
karaṇī pūjyapādaś ca bilvanātho nirañjanāḥ/
kapālībindunāthaś ca kākacaṇḍīśvarādayaḥ//
sukṣāmaḥ prabhudevaś ca ghonārālī gha ṭiṇṭhiniḥ/
bālukir nāgabodhaś ca caṇḍakāpālikas tathā//
ityādayo mahāsiddhā haṭhayogaprabhāvataḥ/
khaṇḍayitvā kāladaṇḍaṃ brahmāṇḍe vicaranti te//
saṃsāratāpataptānāṃ śamāśrayamaṭho haṭhaḥ/
aśeṣayogajagatām ādhāraḥ kamaṭho haṭhaḥ//
haṭhavidyā paraṃ gopyā yoginā siddhim icchatā/
bhaved voryavati guptā nirvīryā tu prakāśitā//
surājye dhārmike deśe subhikṣe nirupadrave/
ekāntamaṭhikāmadhye sthātavyaṃ haṭhayoginā//
alpadvāram arandhragarttapiṭharaṃ nātyuścanīcāyitaṃ/
samyag gomayasāndraliptavimalaṃ niśśeṣajantūjjhitam/
bāhye maṇḍapavedikūparacitaṃ prākārasaṃveṣṭitaṃ/
proktaṃ yogamaṭhasya lakṣaṇam idaṃ siddhair haṭhābhyāsibhiḥ//
evaṃvidhe maṭhe sthitvā sarvacintāvivarjitaḥ/
gurūpadiṣṭamārgeṇa yogam eva sadābhyaset//
atyāhāraḥ prayāsaś ca prajalpo niyamagrahaḥ/
janasaṅgaś ca laulyaṃ ca ṣaḍbhir yogo vinaśyati//
utsāhāt sāhasād dhairyāt tattvajñānād viniścayāt/
janasaṅgaparityāgāt ṣaḍbhir yogaḥ prasidhyati//
athāsanāni//
haṭhasya prathamāṅgatvād āsanaṃ pūrvam ucyate/
tatkuryād āsanaṃ sthairyam ārogyaṃ cāṅgalāghavaṃ//
vasiṣṭhādyaiś ca munibhir matsyendrādyaiś ca yogibhiḥ/
aṅgīkṛtā nāsanāni vakṣyante kānicinmayā//
jānūrvo antare samyak kṛtvā pādatale ubhe/
ṛjukāyaḥ samāsīnaḥ svastikaṃ tat pracakṣate//
savye dakṣiṇagulphaṃ tu pṛṣṭhapārśve niyojayet/
dakṣiṇe tu tathā savyaṃ gomukhe gomukhaṃ yathā//
